attributes.action: Why aren't the NHS offering Hallwang clinic treatment's to cancer patients.
attributes.additional_details:
www.hallwang-clinic.com

Within the agility community we have lost good friends to this unforgiving relentless disease called cancer and are all trying to raise money to send a wonderful lady Yvonne Goode to the clinic why can'take the NHS offer her this treatment? 
https://crowdfunding.justgiving.com/Yvonnegoodejackpawstrading?utm_campaign=jgdonation%3Asupport&utm_content=Yvonnegoodejackpawstrading&utm_medium=Yimbyproject&utm_source=Facebook
attributes.background:
The Hallwang private oncology clinic in Germany uses great advances in cancer treatment's especially in emerging field of cancer immunotherapy. 
The clinic have helped and people from all over the world. People from the UK are funding their own treatment, why isn't the NHS funding their treatments?

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 

You could start a new petition calling on the Government or Parliament to fund specific cancer drugs or treatments on the NHS.
